revised_title: The Effects of Mercurial Vapours on Crew Health in Naval Ships
tldr: The author recounts a case study of a naval ship, the Triumph, where mercury exposure led to severe health issues among the crew. The mercury was released into the air and mixed with the food, causing ptyalism, paralysis, and other ailments. The crew was eventually removed from the ship, and their health improved. The author concludes that inhaling mercurial vapors was the primary cause of the health issues.
